title: Drawing, "Sketch.  A tree at the Canadian bank below Niagara Falls.", September 1856
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at ?: Memorandum / outer edge Rainbow orange / and warm tints / reflected Rainbow reverse / Inside the bow cool / side ground color light outside darkenend / Between double bow / dark land; at lower right: Water between the branches / Dark turquoise green opaque color / Niagara Sep 1856; and beside lower part of trunk:  Green water.
description: A rugged tree with a rough sketch of the Falls in the left background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch.  A tree at the Canadian bank below Niagara Falls.", September 1856.
September 1856. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-181.
